attributes.additional_details:
Tfl are continually increasing prices, and are making millions in profit, yet they have zero facilities to allow passengers comfort. 
Spain and the USA are not only cheaper with public transport but they have these basic facilities for passengers.
attributes.background:
conditions such as heat and humidity can impact on our overall physical intellectual activity, making the simplest of tasks an absolute chore. Having air conditioning system in place helps reduce heat and humidity.
The lower temperatures that air conditioners create can help reduce dehydration.
